info.plot: Starring Stromy Dainels is this brilliant comedic satire of how Donald Trump got elected as the President of the United States of America in 2016 by making a certain type of "Deal". Starring Jeff Rector and Eddie Griffin.

Christine and her ride-or-die crew are on a no-limits mission to get pregnant—by any means necessary. Baby Fever is a wild, raunchy, and unapologetically girl-powered comedy about flipping off the biological clock.

Past their prime model search contestants refuse to let the dream die. Pageant director Vanessa Alexis holds model search competitions in her backyard every day for these wayward former swimsuit models.

“Black Widows” (2016).  Dark comedy revolves around 3 friends who attempt to enact revenge on a predator, but their actions lead to unintended consequences, resulting in the deaths of their lovers. This low-budget thriller explores themes of vengeance and its unforeseen repercussions

Super November is a hugely ambitious mixture of mumblecore-style romantic comedy and Orwellian dystopia. Clydebank librarian Josie (Josie Long) is all loved up and has found her soulmate in the equally besotted Mikey (Sean Biggerstaff). Six months later, the bubble has burst and things are very different, as the country has plunged into a political crisis, there is civil unrest on the streets and normality is a distant memory. Welcome to the harsh, fast changing landscape of the real world.
A young man gets an unexpected phone call from a girl he met once that forces him to comply to her wishes.
Hapless twenty-something Londoner Will Sampson attempts to find true love in the city, with the assistance of his best friend Niall.
After his beloved sandwich goes missing, a grizzled detective must solve the toughest case of his career
A hopeless romantic has an unexpected visitor who can magically make his dreams come true.
A Christmas Musical about the mania of Christmas Eve at the North Pole.

name: That Trip We Took with Dad

info.plot: The story is set in 1968, when a Romanian-German family from the city of Arad starts a journey to the German Democratic Republic, where the older son, Mihai, hopes that surgical intervention for his ailing father will restore the family\'s harmony. Accompanied by Emil, the younger brother, they will be caught in the aftermath of the Prague Spring, which will alter their plans.
Joe, a naive taxi driver working the graveyard shift, struggles to connect with the lost souls he encounters on the job until a customer forces him to confront his personal demons.
A young man becomes manipulated by his imaginary friend to exact revenge on his tormenting co-workers.

The first feature-length film Elixir from the artist and director Daniil Zinchenko is a modern fairy tale with scientists, partisans, cosmonauts, officials, and Motherland. The scientist with his assistant are collecting the ingredients for an elixir. Their goal is to resurrect the dead people. At the same time, officials are looking for the carpenter who has a power to transmute water into oil.
Curious American minds want to know.
Problems of a young couple with a baby.
Five thirty-something men in as many separate segments struggle to grapple with the relentless absurdity of their respective existences.

An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

When the president of The Grand Turkish Republic demands a schnitzel before allowing any Turks to leave the vanishing earth, his hapless assistant Kamil must come up with the fried meat, despite the chickens being dead for over 200 years.

We\'ve all waited for \'the one\', the one who catches our eye, the one who keeps our interest, the one who won\'t expect us to trudge down that conventional path. Annie Waits tells the story of lust and disappointment as a twenty-something waits for her adult life to begin.
A down and out stand-up comedian finds refuge at Hotel Bleu, forging an off-beat partnership with a charismatic trumpet player half her age.

Charlie, an artist who seeks a connection between her work and her estranged father’s music, teams up with Louie, an obsessive record collector from Memphis, and together they begin an exhaustive search for a rare 45 recording from the 1960s Arkansas garage rock scene that takes them both on a journey across the seldom-explored landscape of the new Old South.

Newlyweds face the challenge of living with the husband\'s parents, struggling to keep their relationship strong amidst a lack of privacy. This arrangement tests their patience, love, and boundaries as they navigate daily life in close quarters with family.

A former star footballer turned social justice campaigner returns to his home town, befriends a young wannabe filmmaker who recently lost his father and is persuaded, despite opposition, into coaching the town\'s struggling footy team. He recruits refugees to make up the numbers with hilarious results, taking the community on a journey of change.

Award winning eye opening, thoughtful and engaging experience a family can watch and enjoy together, you will love the message that this film delivers. The photography of the blue Bahama waters and the dolphins is first class. Starring Adrain Dunbar, Catherine Ross and Carly Schroeder

Award winning highly compelling from start to finish, the storyline is creative and thought provoking. Not your stock  romantic comedy standard, turns out to be thought provoking, quirky and highly enjoyable that reminds you that it’s little things in life that count.

An international action drama, it certainly delivers in that regard very fast paced and things get pretty heated,  a lot of interesting twists and turns, as well as dramatic weight. The story of a redemption-seeking English woman going against all odds to save a remote slum in Africa.
Stranded on a nightmarish movie set with no real experience and no way to get home, Alex will find out if he has what it takes to help the crew get the last shot and save the movie.
Award winning drama about four Italian friends whose lives are changed by the tragedy of World War II. Italian with subtitles

Trapped in their home during a brutal storm, a couple is taken hostage by armed men with a secret cargo. As danger closes in from all sides, they’ll need more than luck to survive. Landfall is a storm-fueled thriller where nothing is what it seems.

After being raised in complete darkness and isolation his whole life, "The Captive" is suddenly released into the world. He soon discovers he’s the center of a dangerous sociological experiment and sets off to find the truth about his existence leading to a thrilling confrontation with his maker,

NY84 follows the adventures of three young artists in the downtown New York art scene in the early 1980’s, two of them clearly modeled on Patti Smith and Robert Mapplethorpe, Using an unconventional, collage-like approach this award winner is writer and director by Cyril Morin.

Carol, recently divorced, moves with her children, Amanda (16) and Adam (12), from rural Michigan to a Victorian house near Chicago. As the three begin to adjust to their new surroundings, strange things start to happen. Spooky noises. Unexplained disasters. Old punk rock albums are missing. Suspecting the house is haunted, Adam and Amanda hire a kooky medium and a team of bumbling paranormal investigators to help them.

A widowed firefighter seeks closure after his wife goes missing on an actual haunted road in rural New Jersey but must unlock the road’s secret if he wants to get out alive.  Excellent storyline and cast. Starring Ace Young, Vincent Pastore, Eric Roberts, Erin O’Brien and Ice-T.

A beautiful young woman, Lucy, has a passionate and bloody affair with Count Dracula. Many years later, as she recovers from a strange amnesia, she begins to realize her true identity as a creature who is thirsty of blood. Occult expert Van Helsing tries to save Lucy from the clutches of the vampire, but will her dark dream of living eternally with Dracula come true’

The Lord’s ways are mysterious if not downright perverse in Sympathy for Delicious, an unusual tale of miracles and self-doubt that marks the debut of feature-directing Mark Ruffalo who also stars along with Juliette Lewis and Orlando Bloom. An award winner.
A male chauvinist guru guides his best prodigy through the art of controlling women, only for the student to find out he is not everything that he seems.

After experiencing tragic personal losses, a music professor rents a Seattle mansion with a troubled history where he is haunted by the presence of a spectre. Atmospheric, spooky, tragic and very suspenseful. Multi award winner starring George C Scott and Trish Van Devere (his real wife).

Cult Ozploitation film from the early 1980’s depicts a concentration camp in a totalitarian society which allows rich adventurers to participate in human hunting games, no coincidence the prison camp warden is named Thatcher. Stars Olivia Hussey

In the tradition of cult-classics Easy Rider and Billy Jack! .... Of the time 70s generation gap film about a level headed Hollywood guy who rides a motorcycle back to his redneck Texan small town, where the atmosphere is ripe with gloom and all the citizens hate his successful guts.

Two guys desperate for cash open their own muscle-for-hire business. This inadvertently opens a gateway into the heart of the city’s seedy underworld. Under constant attack from hitmen, zombies, religious extremists, and serial killers - can they rescue their baby and pay the rent on time

In 1948 Hollywood screenplay writer Laura Chandler returns to her childhood home in Wilmington, NC for the premiere of movie star Jason Powell’s latest film, "AND", a bit of revenge against a former lover who betrayed her.
A gangster is going through court trial for murder. Before they have enough evidence to convict him, his trusted lawyer schemes a plan to frame a young woman for the crime. Multi Award winner
A gritty award winning one-shot drama set in a single afternoon where a man comes to grips with the power of his past when his estranged family becomes tangled in its web.

A powerful coming-of-age drama set in 1940s Sweden where a 15-year-old boy falls in love with his teacher during WWII. Directed by Bo Widerberg, this award-winning film explores forbidden desire, moral boundaries, and the painful transition to adulthood.

When a farmer’s wife is brutally murdered by the ruthless bandit Bobby Durango and his gang of killers, Billy Rogers goes back to his old gun and starts to hunt them one by one. This is a Grindhouse style Spaghetti Western shot and made to look like the classic European Westerns of the 1960s and 1970s - true to the form of how they were filmed in the late 1960s.

“Reefer Madness” (1936) is a cult classic exploitation film that hysterically warns audiences about the dire consequences of marijuana use, as innocent teens descend into addiction, crime, and madness after being lured by unscrupulous drug dealers.

Eerily prescient sci-fi film shows how the next world war would be the beginning of radical changes for humanity. A prophetic ride through time. You’re going to be stunned with the futuristic sets, costumes, airplanes, and concepts of society. Starring Ralph Richardson. Directed by Alexander Korda

name: Duck And Cover staring Bert the Turtle

info.plot: Famous, if not infamous Civil Defense film for children in which Bert the Turtle shows what to do in case of atomic attack from 1951. Bert the Turtle is a true rolemodel for kids growing up during cold war.

Very creepy and very stylish in black and white, amazing cinematography which captures the mood of the film perfectly and introduces both vast sets, sweeping panoramas and claustrophobic suspense.  A classic that paved the way for many future horror movies.

name: The Great St. Louis Bank Robbery

info.plot: A very realistic noir documentary style heist film that is based on an actual crime and uses as a location the bank where the robbery took place. Starring Steve McQueen

A thoughtful and absorbing post-apocalyptic film that has soul, based on the Richard Mathes classic novel, "I Am Legend." It is certainly the grandfather of post apocalyptic films. Starring Vincent Price and the stunning Franca Bettola,
The head of a major cosmetics company experiments on herself with a youth formula involving wasps. Classic Roger Corman starring Susan Cabot
Cult classic. A crazed killer known as The Bat is on the loose in a mansion full of people. Starring Vincent Price and Agnes Moorhead
Fantastic noir film. An ex-con trying to go straight is framed. Brilliant performances by John Payne and Coleen Gray, with Lee Van Cleef, Neville Brand, and Preston Foster.

A superior film noir starring iconic actor Edmond O’Brien as a man searching a big city for the people who gave him a slow working poison. With no antidote, he only has hours to live. The suspense builds as each minute passes. Starring Edmond O’Brien and Pamela Britton.

On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there. Wry, funny, charming, engrossing, intelligent, entertaining in every way. Starring Gina Lollabrigida, Peter Lorre, Robert Morley and Humphrey Bogart - written by Truman Capote

name: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers

info.plot: A gripping film noir, Van Heflin and Barbara Stanwyck deliver polished and professional performances, and Lizabeth Scott is beautiful and sympathique Kirk Douglas is very interesting.

Note - (cut the last few frames)

Film noir a story about two undercover cops - one Fed, one local - after a major drug dealer. Neither knows the other’s true identity as they fall in love. starring Fred MacMurray and Claire Trevor.

Feelgood movie is a joyous celebration of the golden age of Hollywood musicals. Starring two talented and well known stars, Fred Astaire and Jane Powell. it exudes all the glamour, creative energy and inspiration that gave its era such a very special place in the history of motion pictures.
Shortly after coming to terms with his daughter’s marriage, a father faces the prospect of becoming a grandfather. Starring Spencer Tracy, Joan Bennett, and Elizabeth Taylor.

A portly gourmet detective  ties the death of a dentist to robbery and a circus clown.  Starring Rock Hudson, the stunning Julie London and  J. Scott Smart, who is truly charming as the titular corpulent fellow.

Fierce competition among sponge fishermen forces a Greek-American family to fish in the dangerous 12-mile reef area off the western coast of Florida. Amazing underwater filming starring Robert Wagner, Terry Moore and Richard Boone

An unemployed veteran gets mixed up in a complex plot to help a mobster’s wife escape, and is framed for murder, leading to a chase. Known for its confusing, dreamlike twists and turns, which were partly a way to work around the Production Code. Starring Peter Lorie and Robert Cummings.

Film noir directed by Fritz Lang concerns two criminals who take advantage of a middle-aged painter in a mid-life crisis who befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses. Banned in New York State and Milwaukee 1946

Stanley Kubrick in his directorial debut. Set against a backdrop of war, the film delves into the struggle of soldiers torn between duty and personal desires, illustrating how extreme circumstances can challenge their humanity and resolve.

name: The Flying Deuces, Laurel and Hardy

info.plot: Ollie has fallen in love with the innkeeper’s daughter in Paris, the only problem.... she’s very much in love with her husband so the duo join the French Foreign Legion. What could possibly go wrong

Amidst vibrant landscapes and ancient predators, the team races against time to complete their findings and escape the planet, battling both the elements and their own fears. Staring Bazil Rathbone and the queen of scream, Faith Domergue

A poignant exploration of mortality unfolds as a writer’s struggle between dreams and reality is revealed. The story intertwines personal reflection, hardship, and the enduring spirit of adventure in the African wilderness. Adapted from Ernest Hemingway book, starring Gregory Peck and Ava Gardner

In the tradition of cult-classics Easy Rider and Billy Jack! .... Of the time 70s generation gap film about a level headed Hollywood guy who rides a motorcycle back to his redneck Texan small town, where the atmosphere is ripe with gloom and all the citizens hate his successful guts.

Inspired by her encounter with a young bushman boy that she meets on the streets of Barcelona, Jana, a lively and curious ten-year-old girl, embarks on an imaginary journey to the Namib desert, accompanied by her magical winged horse.

Ring in the New Year with a fireworks extravaganza that is sure to make your celebration one to remember! Just press play and enjoy an epic show of magic in the sky. Shot in breathtaking high definition this DVD will make your spirit soar with music, sights and sounds that celebrate the coming of a new year! Includes such classics holiday music as Deck The Halls, Joy To The World, Silent Night, Dance Of The Sugar Plum Fairies and many more!

Go Big Or Go Home chronicles the training and aspirations of a collection of young women in a Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania pro wrestling school, and the often harsh realities of the lifestyle that awaits them, if their squared circle dreams come true.
Experience the world around us in breathtaking slow motion and time lapse. Shot in spectacular high definition Motion will allow you to experience life like never before.

name: Independence Day 4th of July: A Fireworks Celebration

info.plot: A powerful celebration of the 4th of July with stunning sights and sounds.

This Earth Day - take a tour around our planet as this comprehensive feature length documentary explores the impact of human existence upon the Earth and what can be done to prevent an ecological disaster. With footage shot around the world, Earth Day both entertains and educates the viewer on the latest global warming and climate change efforts to restore our Earth.
This 4th of July, experience a breathtaking collection of America’s greatest treasures, sights and sounds celebrating the beauty of the USA.

Traces in the Snow is a feature length documentary on Siberia’s punk scene in the 1980′s. Directed by Russian author and film director Vladimir Kozlov, this first-of-its-kind documentary uses rare footage of Siberian punk legends including the punk poet and songwriter Yanka Dyagileva and the controversial godfather of Russian punk Yegor Letov, along with contemporary interviews, to recount the story of Siberia’s improbable punk scene.

A sound journey accros the mountains, deserts and forests of Ethiopia and its cultural universe. Roaring Abyss will take you through an inedit collection of music recordings of unvaluable importance for the transmission and preservation of the African heritage.

Count Karl Ulysses von Salis-Marschlins was a Swiss botanist and naturalist. He travelled widely observing and studying the lands he visited. In 1789 he travelled in the Kingdom of Naples. On returning home, he wrote a book about it. Here is how he described his visit to the \"Casino del Duca\" at San Basilio, the largest estate of Apulia, South Italy. \"Anapeson\" are these places, now, sleepless and abandoned within the distracted modernity. The History as ruins.
Horse Tales tells the story of stable boys, adolescents making a living by taking care of horses. In order to do so, it focuses on their job and their relationships with the animals they care for.

name: New Voices in an Old Flower

info.plot: \"It was an era, it was the beginning of a new vision,\" says Amha Eshete, the first Ethiopian music producer in the Golden Age, Swingin\' Addis days. The album releases that have crossed the borders of Ethiopia are mainly recordings from the 1950s to the 1980s, yet the contemporary Addis music scene remains, with a few exceptions, unknown to the rest of the world. Is Addis still moving like before?

When did you last talk with your father? Will you ever ask him about those things that hurt you? \n In Father the reality of life is turned upside down to create an impossible dialogue - the dialogue between a child and a father that never happens.

name: Jaguar, Closer Than Ever Thought Possible

info.plot: In an effort of accomplishing a childhood dream a former race car driver and nature lover, Mario Haberfeld, spearheads of one of the biggest and boldest environmental conservation projects in Brazil: Project Oncafari. This documentary closely follows Haberfeld and his team on the challenges they face in order to habituate Jaguars, the largest cat in the Americas, to the presence of man.
A.J.s family tells their story of how they handled his deployment to Iraq in 2003.
Love in the midst of chaos.
Gerald Tabios, Filipino Ultra Runner, runs his 5th Badwater 135, considered as the world’s toughest footrace.

Valery Liashkevich is now considered an important Belarus artist - but just one year ago, he was living in the railway station and for over twenty years has painted pictures in the streets of the town of Gomel. For the natives he is no more than a local attraction, but the filmmakers set out to show that this eccentric artist and philosopher has many impor-tant truths to tell us about the meaning of life, that his work and attitude to the world make deep sense.

Bernard and Claire Boiko earned enough money on TV shows to escape debt and rebuild their lives. From Tic-Tac-Dough in 1956 to Jeopardy in 1967 and Trivial Pursuit in 1993, they competed on national television 28 times, probably the longest record for individual appearances on husband-and-wife television shows in the world.

The guerrilla war in Colombia is over, but Carolina who lives in a remote rural region of Catatumbo hasn\'t seen much change. As for the past 20 years, her only viable subsistence comes from the illegal growing of coca and selling coca paste for just enough money to buy food and basic supplies. On paper, the government promises help with crop substitution so traditional coca growers could grow legal crops like bananas or cacao. In reality.

name: The Last White President: Interviews With South Africa\'s FW De Klerk - Part 2

info.plot: Touted as a conservative when he took over from P.W. Botha, former president F.W. de Klerk shocked his supporters and stunned the world by unbanning political parties and freeing Nelson Mandela. This biographical documentary tells the story of how de Klerk made such a surprise decision but how he may have squandered his political legacy by leaving the political stage prematurely.

Alive and incarcerated at Leeuwkop Maximum Security Prison, Lazarus Mazingane has spent the last ten years behind bars after a 5 year reign of terror on Johannesburg’s ethnic women. Posing as a taxi driver, he raped and strangled over 20 women in the 1990’s and was eventually caught at the age of 25.

Tessa Beetge A Life Interrupted follows the story of South African convicted drug mule Tessa Beetge, who was arrested at Sao Paulo’s Guarulhos International Airport for attempting to smuggle 10 kgs of cocaine out of the country. It was her mothers determination and fight that exposed South Africa’s dark underworld of drug trafficking and lead to the arrest of two key role players who were responsible for recruiting Tessa Bettge.

The Liuwa plain is spectacular and remote, and the source of the mighty Zambezi river. Rich golden grasslands dominate the landscape, but each year violent storms hit the Liuwa and the Zambezi bursts its banks, dramatically transforming this savannah into a vast shallow lake. Our story is told through the eyes of a permanent predator of the Liuwa plain, the last remaining lioness of Liuwa.

When a troubled teenager reunites with his older brother, their bond reignites a dangerous mix of buried secrets and paranoia, leading to murder. Inspired by true events, this story delves deep into the complexities of familial relationships, the shadows of the past, and the devastating consequences of hidden truths. As they face their demons, the brothers’ journey becomes a harrowing tale of survival, loyalty, and the thin line between love and destruction.

Gabriel Utterson discovers that his long-time friend, Dr. Henry Jekyll, has become involved with a mysterious and dangerous man named Edward Hyde. He slowly uncovers a dark secret that defies both science and nature, one that leaves a trail of murder and crime in Victorian England. A faithful and chilling adaptation of the legendary horror classic.

In her third collaboration with director Umberto Lenzi, Carroll Baker stars as a glamorous racecar driver entangled in a lurid affair with her ex-husband (Jean Sorel of BELLE DU JOUR and A LIZARD IN A WOMAN’S SKIN), his wealthy new wife, and a twisted web of lust, murder and deception. Luis Dávila (EAGLES OVER LONDON) co-stars in this 1970 Italian/French/Spanish co- production.

Two hit men wake up in the back of a truck to discover they have been drugged and their employer brutally murdered. Their attempts to escape bring about a bloody confrontation with a shocking twist in the tale.

Stranded in London with no memory and no identity that he can recall, a man who believes his name is Peter (Luc Merenda) struggles with amnesia after a car accident. Hitchcockian twists and turns abound in this glamorous giallo where international crime rings and sexy intrigue collide in one of the most underrated treasures of the category’s 1970s heyday.

A surreal thriller that follows Paul, a troubled young man who lives in a rural house with his pregnant girlfriend. His world is turned upside down when her sinister mother Agnes arrives at the home. Instinctively afraid of this witch-like woman who seems to know all of his darkest secrets and fears, she slowly begins to exert a malevolent influence over his life that leads him to his destiny.

Keeps you in the scenes throughout, heart-wrenching, suspenseful, and thought-provoking. Two determined women vie to escape their abusive relationships with a dirty Detective at rock bottom, determined to move sex trafficked girls over the Mexican border. Starring Danny Trejo and Eric Roberts.

name: Huck And The King Of Hearts

info.plot: Taking place in the 1990’s, Huck and his card shark friend, Jim(Graham Greene) travel from California to Nevada searching for Huck’s long-lost grandpa. They are chased by a card player they deceived along the way.

An intriguing stranger tries to bring friends and family members who have been torn apart, together again. As he tries to get others to reconcile their differences, his motives still remain a mystery.
A unique look at criminals and the world they inhabit. An assistant district attorney is dragged into this world to protect his friends but soon learns nothing is what it seems.

Four friends travel and make friends with a fellow traveler and his timid girlfriend only to find them turning up at their retreat, uninvited! All does not go well when drunken evening conversation become violent as events turn to kidnap and murder.

Two hit men wake up in the back of a truck to discover they have been drugged and their employer brutally murdered. Their attempts to escape bring about a bloody confrontation with a shocking twist in the tale.

Alex, a troubled young man is thrust into a dark underworld when he becomes a pawn in a brutal struggle between two drug lords for a new street drug called Loco. Alex’s only hope comes from a beautiful girl, Lydia, who is also caught up in the scheme, and together they try to escape their dangerous world. A shocking surprise awaits them because nothing is what it seems to be in the world of Loco.
A Mormon missionary, Jacob Jackson has a very disciplined regime. But he encounters Kathy. Caught between his desires and pressures from the hierarchy, Jacob finally reveals his true self.
The nominee for U.S. Secretary of the Treasury gets caught in a public controversy around her family\'s hedge fund trusts.
In a future devoid of hope and humanity on the brink of extinction, James and Sophia are faced with choices that will define what being human means.

Cristina (49) has spent her life taking care of her mother Carmen. Single and without a trade or friends, she grows older, year after year in her hometown. A few days from her birth- day, Cristina reconnects with Sandra, a former schoolmate who will show her other ways to live, freely and without prejudice.

Young Mary settles in a town to follow theater courses. Just after her arrival, she is sexually assaulted. The next day she meets Eve, a non-conformist young woman with frayed nerves, who drags her along in a nocturnal and violent maze. For the space of one night, they become Les Vigilantes.

Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed a little over a year ago. After months of recovery and overwhelmed by life\'s new realities, he retired to a family cabin in upstate New York.\n \n   On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, but skeptical of his psychological health, they try to walk the tightrope of confrontation in hopes of convincing Dan to come home.

Fanni has had enough of money and Anna has had enough of pigs. Fanni leaves the city and her pearls behind, while Anna is stuck wearing muddy overalls. When they finally cross paths, they embark on a punk adventure towards Marxist liberty.

In a not-too-distant future only a few homo sapiens are left. Struggling for survival they are forced to live from hunting the last remaining animals in the peripheral ruins of an advanced human civilization. But they are unaware of being stalked themselves by a mysterious scanner. A science-fiction story about hunting and being hunted, about extinction and survival, about dogs - and men.
A light and humorous exploration of one couple\'s marital problems.

This is a story about coming back. Mabel returns to her hometown to find the murderer of her friend Daniela and finds herself on a journey that takes her through nostalgia, love, and betrayal in a town where transvestism takes on an unusual dimension in its day.
When his wife is violently taken from him by a vicious gang, one man sets out get his revenge. But is an eye for an eye truly worth it?
Extra-terrestrials launch a nation-wide assault on Australia, much to the bafflement of the rest of the world.
Cloud, a young man with a particular penchant for wandering and daydreaming, lives in the center of the Creole slum of Lisbon.

Milano, nowadays. Cristian is a 30’s employed at an agency as graphic-designer until short time ago, who has decided to quit due to his creative uneasiness and various intolerances, and who is now trying to look for his own way. Just this is the problem: he’s living such a moment considered by most as a limbo, when he doesn’t know neither how to make a choice nor what might he expect for the future. Steady and still in such a precariousness..
He is a silent man. He walks the streets, watching, looking for the right place. He finds it. In the middle of a market…
In the world where digital replaces social life, a young man chooses not to accept and be like everyone else. With his choice comes an unexpected gift.

Alice, our painfully shy young heroine, is an old soul with a vivid imagination. Having just moved next door to the historic church with her mother and father (the new Episcopal priest), she\'s still grieving the loss of her former life and having a hard time making friends. But despite all this, we soon discover that she is curious, courageous, and most important to our story, she believes in magic and ghosts.

Wicked: For Good stars Cynthia Erivo (Elphaba) and Ariana Grande (Glinda) as witches reuniting to save Oz. Keywords: musical, sequel, friendship, magic, Broadway adaptation, fantasy, witches, conflict, redemption, adventure.

Discover the world’s most Dangerous Animals in this thrilling episode. From stealthy predators to powerful beasts, explore how these creatures hunt, survive, and dominate their environments. A heart-pounding journey into nature’s most fearsome killers.

Wicked: For Good stars Cynthia Erivo (Elphaba) and Ariana Grande (Glinda) as witches reuniting to save Oz. Keywords: musical, sequel, friendship, magic, Broadway adaptation, fantasy, witches, conflict, redemption, adventure.

Dinosaurs are back—and they’re not exactly chill. When a fancy new theme park goes full chaos, it’s up to a raptor trainer (hi, Chris Pratt) to save the day. Jurassic World is big, bold, and full of teeth. Hope you’re not afraid of running.

name: Mission Impossible- The Final Reckoning - New Official Trailer

info.plot: Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and his IMF team face their most dangerous mission yet: stopping a rogue AI threatening global nuclear war. High-stakes action, betrayals, and daring stunts drive this epic, star-studded finale.

A rare Native American artifact sparks a violent clash among outsiders in the modern West. A shy waitress (Sydney Sweeney) and a veteran (Paul Walter Hauser) race ruthless rivals, including Halsey and Eric Dane, in this gritty, star-studded crime thriller.

Former assassin Hutch Mansell tries to escape his violent past on a family vacation, but new enemies force him back into action in this explosive sequel starring Bob Odenkirk, Sharon Stone, and Christopher Lloyd

In a dystopian future, teens must endure a brutal walking contest where stopping means death. As friendships form and rivalries ignite, each step brings them closer to the ultimate test of willpower and survival.

A daring explorer races to uncover the legendary Fountain of Youth, facing ancient secrets, perilous traps, and rivals in a thrilling adventure that tests the limits of courage, greed, and the true cost of immortality.

Warfare (2025) is a raw, realistic war drama based on Ray Mendoza’s SEAL experiences in Iraq. Set during a chaotic 2006 mission in Ramadi, the film captures the brutality of combat, sacrifice, and survival. With gripping performances, it’s a sobering look at the human cost of war, praised for its au

Tron: Ares is the third installment in Disney’s iconic Tron franchise, directed by Joachim Rønning. The story follows Ares, a highly advanced and rogue artificial intelligence program.  With Jared Leto

In the psychological thriller directed by Lorcan Finnegan, a man returns to the idyllic beach of his childhood to surf with his son. But his desire to hit the waves is thwarted by a group of locals whose mantra is “don’t live here, don’t surf here.”

Only one man has the particular set of skills... to lead Police Squad and save the world! Lt. Frank Drebin Jr. (Liam Neeson) follows in his father’s footsteps in THE NAKED GUN, directed by Akiva Schaffer (Saturday Night Live, Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping) and from producer Seth MacFarlane.

The Amateur is a 2025 action thriller film, based on the 1981 novel by Robert Littell, about a CIA cryptographer, Charlie Heller, who, after his fiancée is killed by terrorists, blackmails his agency to train him to hunt down the terrorists.

Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) has a talent for solving complex problems. When an old acquaintance is murdered, leaving behind a cryptic message to “find the accountant,” Wolff is compelled to solve the case. Realizing more extreme measures are necessary,

Superman movie, directed by James Gunn, the titular hero, Clark Kent, grapples with reconciling his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing, embodying truth, justice, and the American way in a world that views these ideals as old-fashione

In SHADOW FORCE, Kyrah (Washington) and Isaac (Sy) were once the leaders of a multinational special forces group called Shadow Force. They broke the rules by falling in love, and in order to protect their son, they go underground. With a large bounty on their heads.

Set in 1987 Oakland, Freaky Tales is a multi-track mixtape of colorful characters — an NBA star, a corrupt cop, a female rap duo, teen punks, neo-Nazis, and a debt collector — on a collision course in a fever dream of showdowns and battles.

Levon Cade (Statham) left his “profession” behind to live a simple life working construction and spending time with his daughter. But when his boss’s teenage daughter vanishes, he’s called upon to re-employ the skills that made him a legendary figure in the shadowy world of black ops.

When an American family is invited to spend the weekend at the idyllic country estate of a charming British family they befriended on vacation, what begins as a dream holiday soon warps into a snarled psychological nightmare.

name: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning - Official Trailer

info.plot: Our lives are the sum of our choices. Tom Cruise is Ethan Hunt in Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning..
A musician plagued by insomnia is pulled into an odyssey with a stranger who begins to unravel the very core of his existence.

Two years after M3GAN, a marvel of artificial intelligence, went rogue and embarked on a murderous (and impeccably choreographed) rampage and was subsequently destroyed, M3GAN’s creator Gemma (Allison Williams) has become a high-profile author and advocate for government oversight of A.I.

name: Vietnam: The War that Changed America - Official Trailer

info.plot: Vietnam: The War that Changed America Official Trailer - The reunion of old friends, first-person accounts, and rarely seen footage paint an extraordinary and deeply profound picture of what it was like to live through one of history’s longest wars. Narrated by Ethan Hawke.

Struggling with addiction and job loss, a man’s life takes a turn when he meets a free-spirited woman. She becomes a ray of hope, altering his outlook on life, but their paths part ways, leaving him to face his future with the memories of her transformative influence.

A young couple meets in a small town in northern Nevada. They fall in love despite their humble shelter and their lowly jobs working in a casino and bar. It soon becomes problematic for the couple when their spotted past come to haunt them and they are forced to make an escape to the wilds of the desert.

A traumatizing ’80s Canadian children’s film featuring disturbing content: burning homeless people, baldness, psychotic teachers, abductions, child labor, and a strange concoction for growing pubic hair. Notorious for scarring young viewers who watched it on cable or VHS.

Coyote is a feature film shot in the desert bordering Arizona and Mexico. After their Mexican friend gets deported, two young Americans decide to begin smuggling illegal immigrants into Arizona for profit. Once they create the plan, it is clear that the path to freedom is going to be filled with danger.
Based on Daniel Defoe’s immortal classic, Robinson Crusoe, a 17th century man survives a shipwreck and then must carve out a life for himself on a deserted island.

name: The Story Of The Great Desert Wanderers

info.plot: About 80 million years old, almost completely barren with less than 10mm of rainfall annually, measuring about 50 000 sq km; this is the Namib desert, an arid and hostile land – yet it is home to many unique creatures and those who inhabit her must adapt to her rules. Located in the Kaokoland region of the Namib Desert, the elephant has become a master of desert survival, adapting its behaviors, feeding patterns.

Ama Dablam – Beyond The Void is a documentary film about an expedition to climb the 6.856 meters high peak in the Himalayas.  It’s an adventure film for general audiences. Main character is Simon Yates "the man with the knife" who became world famous when the film Touching The Void came out.  Ama Dablam is a film about two ordinary guys who want to climb big mountains, and their adventure with one of the most famous mountaineer of our times.

In the remote volcanic archipelago of the Crozet islands, meet David Reicnert, a cameraman who has an extraordinary talent to locate, approach and tame some of the wildest beasts on Earth. Enduring raging winds and icy waters with minimal protection, he enters the intimacy of elephant seals and orcas using clever ethological analyses and gets them used to his presence.

Our ongoing quest to explore and come to terms with the Arctic is presented in the context of the crucial role that ice plays in the north.  Ice is to the Arctic as trees are to the rainforest.  It is the underpinning of the ecosystem, the foundation upon which the animals and plants of the north depend.  We meet an ice scientist who lives and works with the Inuit, blending their traditional knowledge with modern scientific methods.
Witness a poetic story of survival in the harsh conditions of Alaska.

The movie tells the story of Jérôme Josserand one of the best snowkiters in the world on his adventure in the land of fire and ice – Iceland.  The camera is following Jérôme, when he explores with his kite the magnificent landscapes of this wild island.

A seven chapter 90 minute movie that highlights the stages which mark the fanatic climbers among the best of the world.  This documentary allows you to appreciate how climbing has evolved through the years and the state of mind which leads these passionate climbers to the top.  Girls from a range of different generations were chosen for the film, including Brook Roboutou (9 years old) to Lynn Hill (50 years old).
Stunning and sobering—The Last Days of the Arctic captures a vanishing world in breathtaking detail. Stream it free, wherever you are.

A poignant exploration of mortality unfolds as a writer’s struggle between dreams and reality is revealed. The story intertwines personal reflection, hardship, and the enduring spirit of adventure in the African wilderness. Adapted from Ernest Hemingway book, starring Gregory Peck and Ava Gardner

Christmas Ranch is a feel-good film about hope and second chances! The story is about a strong-willed girl who is sent to stay with her grandmother on her horse ranch for Christmas. She begins to care for her grandmother’s pony and becomes determined to help save the ranch from foreclosure.

The event features two fights with the title on the line - one in the main event of the evening when Jadier Harrera faces off Jeff Ofori for the WBC International Title and for the WBC Middle East Title where Dayan Gonzalez takes on Joseph Ambo.

The event features two fights with the title on the line - one in the main event of the evening when Jadier Harrera faces off Jeff Ofori for the WBC International Title and for the WBC Middle East Title where Dayan Gonzalez takes on Joseph Ambo.
